external_references.description: Perez, D. et al. (2021, May 27). Re-Checking Your Pulse: Updates on Chinese APT Actors Compromising Pulse Secure VPN Devices. Retrieved February 5, 2024.

description: [APT5](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1023) has used the BLOODMINE utility to parse and extract information from Pulse Secure Connect logs.(Citation: Mandiant Pulse Secure Update May 2021)
